event AssetLegacyRecord(address indexed playerAddress, address indexed gameAddress, uint256 indexed assetId, uint256 recordId)
event RoleAdminChanged(bytes32 indexed role, bytes32 indexed previousAdminRole, bytes32 indexed newAdminRole)
event RoleGranted(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event RoleRevoked(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
function assetRecordByIndex(uint256 assetId, uint256 index) view returns (tuple(uint256 assetId, address gameAddress, uint256 timestamp, string data) record)
function create(address playerAddress, address gameAddress, uint256 assetId, string data)
function getRoleMember(bytes32 role, uint256 index) view returns (address)
function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) view returns (bool)
function recordByIndex(uint256 index) view returns (tuple(uint256 assetId, address gameAddress, uint256 timestamp, string data) record)
